Dragon bolts are a type of crossbow ammo that can only be fired from an Armadyl crossbow, dragon crossbow, dragon hunter crossbow, or Zaryte crossbow. Additionally, they require a Ranged level of 61 to wield.

They are obtained by using feathers on unfinished dragon bolts. Doing so requires level 84 in Fletching, and grants 12 experience per bolt.

Bolt tips of any kind, excluding amethyst, can be added to dragon bolts and then enchanted to obtain enchanted bolts that possess the ranged strength of dragon bolts.

'''Dragon bolts''' are a type of [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] [[Bolts|ammo]] that can only be fired from an [[Armadyl crossbow]], [[dragon crossbow]], [[dragon hunter crossbow]], or [[Zaryte crossbow]]. Additionally, they require a [[Ranged]] level of 61 to wield.

They are obtained by using [[feathers]] on [[Dragon bolts (unf)|unfinished dragon bolts]]. Doing so requires level 84 in [[Fletching]], and grants 12 experience per bolt.

[[Bolt tips]] of any kind, excluding [[Amethyst bolt tips|amethyst]], can be added to dragon bolts and then enchanted to obtain [[enchanted bolts]] that possess the [[ranged strength]] of dragon bolts.
